name: Strides
description: Short accelerations to near-sprint, then decelerate. 20-30 seconds each.
purpose: Maintain leg speed, improve running economy, neuromuscular activation.

structure.main: 4-6 x 20-30 seconds, accelerating to ~95% max speed

notes: Strides should feel smooth and fast, never strained. Think 'quick feet' not 'hard effort'.
